verses.name: 1 Corinthians 13:4
verses.text: Charity suffereth long, and is kind; charity envieth not; charity vaunteth not itself, is not puffed up,

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 13:5
verses.text: Doth not behave itself unseemly, seeketh not her own, is not easily provoked, thinketh no evil;

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 13:6
verses.text: Rejoiceth not in iniquity, but rejoiceth in the truth;

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 13:7
verses.text: Beareth all things, believeth all things, hopeth all things, endureth all things.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 13:8
verses.text: Charity never faileth: but whether there be prophecies, they shall fail; whether there be tongues, they shall cease; whether there be knowledge, it shall vanish away.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 13:9
verses.text: For we know in part, and we prophesy in part.
